name: XIAOBin
content:
Dr. Bin Xiao (肖斌) is a full professor in the 
				Department of Computing, the Hong Kong Polytechnic 
		University. He has been the dept. research committee chair (DRC Chair) 
				from 2018 
				to 2021. He received the B.Sc and M.Sc degrees in the Electronics 
		Engineering from Fudan University, China, and Ph.D. degree in Computer 
		Science from University of Texas at Dallas, USA in 2003. After his Ph.D. 
		graduation, he joined the Hong Kong Polytechnic University as an 
		assistant professor. Currently, he is the associate editor of IEEE TCC and IEEE TNSE , IEEE ComSoc distinguished lecturer , 
				the chair of IEEE ComSoc Communications and Information 
				Security Technical Committee ( CISTC Chair ), a Fellow of IEEE and a Fellow of 
				AAIA . He has been the associate editor for Elsevier 
				JPDC from 2016 to 2021 and IEEE IoTJ from 2020 to 2023. Many graduates from his group got faculty positions in the top 
				universities in both the mainland and HK.

Ph.D. Opportunity : In general, we are looking 
		for good Ph.D. 
		  candidates all year around (fellowship HK$18,890 per month) in the

		e.g., AI security, Database security and privacy, Web3 (DID) and Blockchain 
		Systems . Please send me your CV and 
		  supporting documents if you have interest.  
		We also have the and 
		other that welcome your application. We still have a number of positions for the2025academic year . 




Post-Doc Opportunity : 
				We have the HK RGC, PolyU Postdoctoral Fellowship schemes (around HKD30,000/month 
				) to support aspiring scholars (以及同内地共同培养博士后计划，香港这边资助18个月). If your research area is in the 
				field of Data Science, AI security, Database 
				security and privacy, 
				or Web3 , please contact me with your 
				CV and publications.
